title: Futuristic Combat - Audio Pack
description: High Quality Futuristic Combat sounds for your game!
longDescription:
Hello!


In this pack you'll find 35 high quality futuristic combat sounds with some variations in each sound, 106 audio files in all! Here's the list:


35 high quality futuristic combat sounds:


  1. Laser shot v1
  2. Laser shot v2
  3. Laser shot v3
  4. Laser shot v4
  5. Laser shot v5
  6. Laser shot v6
  7. Big shot v1
  8. Big shot v2
  9. Digital Panel v1
  10. Explosion v1
  11. Explosion v2
  12. Grenade Launcher v1
  13. Grenade v1
  14. Grenade v2
  15. Grenade v3
  16. LightSaber v1
  17. LightSaber v2
  18. LightSaber v3
  19. Machine Gun v1
  20. Machine Gun v2
  21. Reload v1
  22. Reload v2
  23. Reload v3
  24. Reload v4
  25. Rifle v1
  26. Shield v1
  27. Shield v2
  28. ShotGun v1
  29. Targeted v1
  30. Teleport v1
  31. Teleport v2
  32. Teleport v3
  33. Teleport v4
  34. Teleport v5
  35. Unload Weapons v1



CHECK THE PREVIEW

CHECK THE DOCUMENTATION




Bonus

  • All sounds come with some extra variation, or a tail/cast, all the pack has more than 100 audio files
  • This pack will have updates, and after the purchase you'll get them for free
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 106

Number of Audio Cues: 106

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Here

Important/Additional Notes: The image is free for commercial use distruted by pixabay, and the font is Squares bold free for commercial use distributed by 1001 fonts
